title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate software delivery with Amazon ECS (CNS315)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon ECS 加速软件交付 (CNS315)
abstract: In today’s fast-paced landscape, development teams need to deploy code changes to production safely and frequently to deliver business value faster. Learn how Amazon Elastic Container Service (ECS) capabilities make deployments safer and more reliable for different applications, including blue/green deployments with zero-downtime rollouts, traffic shifting, validation hooks, and automated rollback to help you respond quickly to changing requirements and dependencies.
abstract_cn: 在当今快节奏的环境中，开发团队需要安全且频繁地将代码变更部署到生产环境，以更快地交付业务价值。了解Amazon Elastic Container Service (ECS) 功能如何为不同应用程序提供更安全、更可靠的部署，包括零停机时间的蓝/绿部署、流量切换、验证钩子和自动回滚，帮助您快速响应不断变化的需求和依赖关系。
